tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE cryptocurrency_investments (
  investment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  cryptocurrency_name VARCHAR(50),
  investment_date DATE,
  investment_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  investment_return DECIMAL(10, 2),
  investment_profit DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE investments (
    investment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    cryptocurrency_name VARCHAR(50),
    purchase_date DATE,
    purchase_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    quantity DECIMAL(10, 2),
    selling_price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE profits (
    profit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    investment_id INT,
    profit_date DATE,
    profit_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (investment_id) REFERENCES investments(investment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE investments (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    investor_id INT NOT NULL,
    investment_date DATE NOT NULL,
    investment_amount DECIMAL(12, 2) NOT NULL,
    investment_currency VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    investment_id INT NOT NULL,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    transaction_date DATE NOT NULL,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL(12, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Investment (
    investment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    investment_name VARCHAR(255),
    investment_type VARCHAR(50),
    investment_amount DECIMAL(12, 2),
    investment_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Cryptocurrency (
    cryptocurrency_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    cryptocurrency_name VARCHAR(255),
    cryptocurrency_symbol VARCHAR(10),
    cryptocurrency_price DECIMAL(12, 2),
    market_cap DECIMAL(20, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE Transaction (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    investment_id INT,
    cryptocurrency_id INT,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    transaction_date DATE,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL(12, 2),
    transaction_fee DECIMAL(8, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE Profitability (
    profitability_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    investment_id INT,
    profit_amount DECIMAL(12, 2),
    profit_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE investments (
    investment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    cryptocurrency_id INT,
    investment_date DATE,
    investment_amount DECIMAL,
    investment_return DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    investment_id INT,
    transaction_date DATE,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(10),
    transaction_amount DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE reports (
    report_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    report_date DATE,
    investment_id INT,
    profit_id INT,
    total_profit DECIMAL
);
